repoPath.description: Repository that hosts the blocks. (Defaults to local)

trustRepoPath.description: When enabled ts-blocks won't ask before downloading code from the provided `repoPath`.

blocksPath.description: Location of the blocks directory containing the `manifest.json` file in the repository.

listLocal.description: When true will still list the local blocks along side any remote blocks.

path.description: The path to place the blocks

includeIndexFile.description: When true creates an `index.ts` at the root of the folder and exports each function from it when added.

includeTests.description: When true includes the test files for each function in the same directory.

imports.description: Controls the suffix when re-exporting from index.ts.

watermark.description: When true will add a watermark with the version at the top of the installed files.
